title: Elegant slab serifs
content: Can anyone recommend any beautiful elegant, dainty (sp?) slab serifs? Thinking about ones that come in thin weights as this will help in communicating the elegance factor. I know i have seen a few in recent publications and art gallery invites but ive no idea what they are or where to purchase. Any tips anyone? The new typeface Archer springs to mind, but any others anyone else can recommend?
author: Arran

comments.content: See the slab serifs on the [Extra Thin Fonts](http://web.archive.org/web/20100525082200/http:/fontfeed.com/archives/extra-thin-ultra-light-fonts/) list.

Additional: [Archer](http://web.archive.org/web/20100525082200/http:/www.typography.com/fonts/font_overview.php?productLineID=100033) by H+FJ and [Museo](http://web.archive.org/web/20100525082200/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/exljbris/museo/) by Jos Buivenga.

Thanks for the replies guys. Stephen, great list - perfect. Particularly like Bodoni Egyptian.

Thanks
